body: Okay, I now understand why I'm confused; simply, a) Darwin consumes various kernel resources more than I expect because of probably bridging cosumer thread cancelation stuff and Mach stuff, b) there was no -test.count flag in go1.4 and I used -test.cpu flag when I added TestLookupIPDeadline. There is no big difference about the # of cosumed Ms via runtime.newm between go1.4 and tip. Thanks.
